name.namePart: Louisiana State University A Cappella Choir.

mods.note: This work was first performed by the Louisiana State University A Cappella Choir (soprano, alto, tenor, bass) with Dallas Draper conducting. Contents: November Night (begins at :00)--Triad (begins at 1:26).
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
